Class DirectedGraphActivityPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, org.jgraph.event.GraphSelectionListener

    public class DirectedGraphActivityPanel
extends DetailsPanel
implements org.jgraph.event.GraphSelectionListener
    Extension for basic activity panel. Specialised for 'directed acyclic graph' activities.
    Author:
    clc

      • createGraphEdgeBetweenSelectedNodes

        private void createGraphEdgeBetweenSelectedNodes()
        Creates a graph edge between the two selected nodes. The edge direction is from the node which was selected first to the node which was selected second.

      • deleteSelectedGraphObjects

        private void deleteSelectedGraphObjects()
        Deletes all selected nodes and edges
